txt.en:
'Hold there!'

The guard yells, eyeing you suspiciously.

'From where do you come stranger, and what is your business in Ambarûl?'

You tell her that you recently came from Umbar and your business is your own. She gazes at you while she carefully considers your answer.

'Girhâzi will wish to speak to you. Continue south and you will come to the town of Iridír. There you will find Girhâzi. Think not of making trouble for the people in Ambarûl or death will swiftly find you. Iridír is well-guarded, and we do not hesitate to relieve our enemies of their heads. Go now.'
This formidable-looking woman must be Girhâzi, the apparent leader of the people here in Ambarûl. With a curious look, she silently assesses you for several uncomfortable heartbeats.
A guard along the road has directed you to the village of Iridír, where you have been told to go and present yourself to Girhâzi.
Iridír is along the north bank of the Ikorbân River in Ambarûl. You should go there and meet Girhâzi.
'Girhâzi will wish to speak to you. Continue south along this road and you will come to the village of Iridír. Go there and present yourself to her.'
